projects.title: To sit or not to sit?
projects.body: Is there a way to hack consumer devices so that they can detect the difference between standing, sitting, and lying down?

projects.title: Cross Diagnosis Association with Pharmacological Agents
projects.body: Perform an unbiased database analysis of diagnosis associated with pharmacological agents.

projects.title: Patient Controlled Opioid Tracking
projects.body: Build a mobile or web application that allows patients to track their opioid medication usage after surgery.

projects.title: Tracking Eating Disorders
projects.body: A mobile application that will help parents keep track of behavioral changes in children/adolescents with disordered eating behaviors that could later be shared with a therapist.

projects.title: Identify Treatment Programs for Eating Problems
projects.body: A technological strategy to help parents and patients identify treatment programs for eating problems efficiently and with some measures of quality.

projects.title: Track Patient Outcomes Following Intervention
projects.body: A digital health framework to monitor and survey patients could have a transformative impact on clinical care.

projects.title: Collaboration for Locally-driven Improvement in Medicine and Beyond
projects.body: Medical errors can be minimized when clinician teams implement “plan, do, study, act” (PDSA) cycles in response to patient safety concerns.
